article.class: fl-post post-6 page type-page status-publish hentry

h1.span: Welcome to Riceville Community School District

div.p: The Riceville Community School District is committed to providing a balanced education focusing on academic excellence, high expectations of performance, respect of self and others, and integration of technology in collaboration with parents, students, and our global society.
Riceville Community School District offers career and technical programs in the following service areas:

ul.li: Applied Sciences, Technology, Engineering, and Manufacturing

div.p: If you have questions about the Riceville Community School District, please feel free to contact us. Go Wildcats!

div.span:
Feels like: 36°F
Wind: 22mph N
Humidity: 91%
Pressure: 29.73"Hg
UV index: 0

a.title: Weather Atlas - Weather forecast Riceville, Iowa

p.span: For more information about the Riceville Community School district, please contact us.

br.span: School Counselor & Foster Care Contact: Michelle Dohlman

span.p: Thank you for contacting the Riceville Community School District. Someone will be in contact soon! Go Wildcats!
